title: Change position after fard even when I've done Adkhaar?  assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner] from Saudi Arabia thank you so much for your give us the true 
path of our questions my question is that   when I pray the fard Salah after that can I 
must change a place if I pray that Salah first   and then I sit and make athkaar you know 
subhanallah and other athkaar after salah   and then I pray the same place after uh after the 
first prayer that will be allowed and my question   is also the same for my woman female okay I will 
answer you inshallah so latif's question is clear   there is a Hadith or a number of hadiths such as 
the Hadith of Mu'awiya may Allah be pleased with   him and others where the Prophet (Peace and 
Blessings Upon him) orders those who prayed   Friday prayer not to connect it afterwards 
with the Sunnah before speaking to someone   else or changing and shifting their position 
and the Hadith also was mentioned in other fard   prayers not only Friday where the Prophet (Peace 
and Blessings Upon him) says is it hard for you   to go a bit forward or backwards or to the 
right or to the left before you pray your Sunnah   and this is an instruction from the 
prophet Islam to change your position   so the most authentic opinion is 
that after concluding your fard   you must not pray your Sunnah unless you speak to 
someone by giving him Salam or checking the time   or standing and Shifting the position a little 
bit to the forward or backwards or to the right   or to the left and this is the most authentic 
opinion some Scholars said that if you concluded   your fard and engaged in dhikr that would be 
sufficient because this is considered to be   separating the fourth from the Sunnah but this 
is not authentic and it doesn't require you to   be a rocket scientist to shift a little bit 
or at least say salaam to the one next to you   in order to follow the instruction of the 
Prophet (Peace and Blessings Upon him) should   a woman who's praying in her home follow the same 
ruling the answer is yes after fard prayer do not   connect it with Sunnah unless you change 
your position the place you the spot you   prayed on or you speak with someone but if you 
prayed the Sunnah and you want to pray another   Sunnah or to follow the Sunnah with fard you 
don't have to change your position if you want   to pray you're witr you don't have to change 
your position only after concluding the fard   do not pray the Sunnah on the same spot 
until you do one of these two things and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford it 
that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled   for one free session and this is for everybody 
if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot   afford it because they're poor I'll give them 
one free session without a problem a full half   an hour so come to me and let's speak about 
it inshallah within the following two days   or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for All
